channel.title: Passwords on SerializingMe
channel.description: Recent content in Passwords on SerializingMe

item.title: Frontdoor to the Technicolor 7210
item.description: In a previous article, I explained how to get root on the embedded Linux part of the Technicolor 7210 router by leveraging a remote code execution (RCE). This article on the other hand, will explain how one can leverage a “frontdoor” to gain the same level of access.

item.title: Rooting the Technicolor 7210
item.description: The Technicolor 7210 home router is a powerful little device. It provides 1Gbps Ethernet, dual-band wireless for speeds ranging from 300Mbps to 1300Mbps, and Network Attached Storage (NAS) for file sharing and media streaming.

item.title: HPQPswd Encrypted Passwords Decryption
item.description: Ever wondered how to decrypt HPQPswd encrypted passwords? So did I when, for the first time, I came across a strange file called password.bin with a magic value of _HPPW12_.

item.title: Portugueses e Senhas de Acesso, Um Caso de Estudo
item.description: Nos últimos anos tenho tido a oportunidade de coleccionar várias listas de senhas de acesso. O que se segue é um caso de estudo focado em três dessas listas. Sendo que estas, são de sítios portugueses.
